product_name: Counter Assault Bear Deterrent Spray - 8.1 oz.
long_description: Counter Assault Bear Deterrent spray is designed to drive away bears in the event of an attack. Contains 2% Capsaicin and other Capsaicinoids, red pepper derivatives that affect the eyes and respiratory system, staving off attack. Spray reaches 12 to 30 ft. and empties in approximately 7 sec. Counter Assault Bear Deterrent spray includes a safety cap to help prevent accidental discharge. .
short_description: Counter Assault Bear Deterrent spray is designed to drive away bears in the event of an attack.
